entries.title_d: Escort a crippled refugee transport. A waypoint should be displaying where you need to go. When you arrive the transport should be there momentarily. Follow it and defend it from any enemy threats.
entries.title: Tatooine system: Escort Crippled Refugee Transport.
entries.thanks_3: I'm not sure this piece of junk will hold for another attack like that...
entries.thanks_1: Lets get a move on, I suspect more will come.
entries.taunt_5: Rebel fools, you won't leave this system alive!
entries.taunt_4: Cut your engines and surrender Rebels!
entries.taunt_3: You are in violation of enough Imperial laws for us to kill you if you don't surrender!
entries.taunt_2: Finally some action in this backwater system!
entries.taunt_1: Thought you would get away that easy Rebel scum?!
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Command: < There's another freighter that need your help pilot, don't let us down again! >
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are done for! I hope you can take care of these TIE's quickly!
entries.reason_5: Man, it's good to see you! We just shook some TIE fighters off our tail but they took a few chunks out of us first.
entries.reason_4: Man, it's good to see you! We just shook a pair of TIE fighters off our tail but they took a few chunks out of us first.
entries.reason_3: Man, it's good to see you! We just shook a pair of TIE fighters off our tail but they took a few chunks out of us first.
entries.reason_2: Man, it's good to see you! We just shook a pair of TIE fighters off our tail but they took a few chunks out of us first.
entries.reason_1: Man, it's good to see you! We just shook a pair of TIE fighters off our tail but they took a few chunks out of us first.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Fly to this location and await the arrival of a crippled Alliance transport.
entries.quest_location_d: Fly to the rendezvous point and join a crippled Alliance transport for the last leg of its journey.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the crippled refugee transport to a safe location. Stay sharp!
entries.panic_5: Hold on everyone, this will get bumpy!
entries.panic_4: Imperial scum, coming straight for us!
entries.panic_2: More TIE fighters heading our way!
entries.panic_1: I guess we didn't shake them after all!
entries.hull_half: We're taking heavy damage here pilot, can't take much more!
entries.hello: Man, it's good to see you! We just shook a pair of TIE fighters off our tail. Hopefully they won't come back...
entries.goodbye_5: Safe and sound! Thanks, pilot! We'll see you around...
entries.goodbye_4: Safe and sound! Thanks, pilot! We'll see you around...
entries.goodbye_3: Safe and sound! Thanks, pilot! We'll see you around...
entries.goodbye_2: Safe and sound! Thanks, pilot! We'll see you around...
entries.goodbye_1: Safe and sound! Thanks, pilot! We'll see you around...
entries.found_loc: Head to this location immediately, a refugee ship is in trouble.
entries.failed_protect: You have any idea how many lifes were lost?! What were you doing out there? Return to base immediately!
entries.failed_destroy: You have any idea how many lifes were lost?! Return to base immediately!
entries.complete: Great job pilot, they are safe. Return to base.
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: You are at the correct location pilot, the refugee freighter should be there in a second. Escort him while he's repairing his ship.
entries.abort: We can't make it! MAYDAY! MAYDAY! <*static*>
